name: Iris Eye Care & Contact Lens Gallery
address: 6550 Holly Avenue NE, Suite D1-B, Albuquerque, NM 87113
description: Provides comprehensive preventive and general optometry services, including diagnosis and treatment of ocular problems, disease management, and routine eye exams. They utilize advanced technology and offer a full suite of medical eye-care services

name: Taylor Family Eye Care
address: 6001 San Mateo Blvd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87109
description: Offers a full range of optometry services for the entire family, aiming to provide high-quality care in a welcoming and compassionate environment

name: Eye Associates of New Mexico
address: Multiple locations across New Mexico, including Albuquerque and Santa Fe. (Specific addresses vary by clinic.)
description: One of the largest comprehensive eye care practices in the United States, offering a full range of services from LASIK and cataract surgery to healthy eye examinations and management of complex eye diseases

name: ABQ Eye Care, PC
address: 5000 Indian School Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87110
description: Provides a full range of optometry services for adults and children, including eye examinations, treatment of eye disease, emergency care, contact lenses, glasses, and vision therapy. They emphasize a tradition of excellence and community involvement

name: Eyes of NM
address: 7400 Montgomery Blvd NE, Suite 102, Albuquerque, NM 87109
description: Specializes in treatment options that improve vision and overall well-being, offering services such as myopia management, vision therapy, and concussion treatment in a comfortable and friendly environment
